entry.title: $2100 // Large Studio, Upper East Side, All Utilities Included, Ready Feb 15th
entry.content:
This is a large 2 room studio in the Historic Cherokee with a separate kitchen and lovely tiled bath. Living space can easily fit a queen sized bed, a couch and a TV. There is also a large windowed Kitchen with a full sized refrigerator and plenty of room for a table and chairs.
The living space features a Juliet balcony with a ceiling to floor window that gives the unit great natural light. Hardwood floors through out the unit. Building features a resident laundry room, package room and live in super.

All utilities included in rent (heat, hot water, electric, and gas) This is a gated community and the unit is on the first floor. It's location can't be beat! It is adjacent to a walkway across the East River as well as a public park.

Free Public pool at the end of the block
Unit is still occupied. To view please contact me for an appointment.

Unit can come furnished for an extra $50.00 per month. Bed, couch, Flat Screen TV, High top table and stools.

Available February 15th.
Contact Leslie at show contact info or text to show contact info for more information or to set up an appointment to view. Thanks !
